Custom metadata structures overview
Â¶
Custom metadata in Atlan is structurally composed of two levels:
The custom metadata definition (sometimes referred to as
set
) itself, defined as a
CustomMetadataDef
The
attributes
(or properties) within that custom metadata set, each defined as an
AttributeDef
erDiagram
CustomMetadataDef ||--o{ AttributeDef : contains
Through Atlan's APIs, you can
create your own custom metadata
sets and attributes programmatically.
Once the structures exist, you can then also
change custom metadata values
on assets themselves.
